   20: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   21: %%% Purpose: Test suite for the 'maps' module.
   22: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   23: 
   24: -module(maps_SUITE).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: 
   28: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
   29: 
   30: -export([t_update_with_3/1, t_update_with_4/1,
   31:          t_get_3/1, t_filter_2/1, t_filtermap_2/1,
   32:          t_fold_3/1,t_map_2/1,t_size_1/1, t_foreach_2/1,
   33:          t_iterator_1/1, t_put_opt/1, t_merge_opt/1,
   34:          t_with_2/1,t_without_2/1,
   35:          t_intersect/1, t_intersect_with/1,
   36:          t_merge_with/1, t_from_keys/1,
   37:          error_info/1,
   38:          t_from_list_kill_process/1,
   39:          t_from_keys_kill_process/1,
   40:          t_values_kill_process/1,
   41:          t_keys_kill_process/1,
   42:          t_from_list_check_trapping/1,
   43:          t_from_keys_check_trapping/1,
   44:          t_keys_trapping/1,
   45:          t_values_trapping/1,
   46:          t_groups_from_list/1]).
   47: 
   48: -define(badmap(V,F,Args), {'EXIT', {{badmap,V}, [{maps,F,Args,_}|_]}}).
   49: -define(badkey(K,F,Args), {'EXIT', {{badkey,K}, [{maps,F,Args,_}|_]}}).
   50: -define(badarg(F,Args), {'EXIT', {badarg, [{maps,F,Args,_}|_]}}).
   51: 
   52: suite() ->
   53:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   54:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   55: 
   56: all() ->
   57:     [t_update_with_3,t_update_with_4,
   58:      t_get_3,t_filter_2,t_filtermap_2,
   59:      t_fold_3,t_map_2,t_size_1,t_foreach_2,
   60:      t_iterator_1,t_put_opt,t_merge_opt,
   61:      t_with_2,t_without_2,
   62:      t_intersect, t_intersect_with,
   63:      t_merge_with, t_from_keys,
   64:      error_info,
   65:      t_from_list_kill_process,
   66:      t_from_keys_kill_process,
   67:      t_values_kill_process,
   68:      t_keys_kill_process,
   69:      t_from_list_check_trapping,
   70:      t_from_keys_check_trapping,
   71:      t_keys_trapping,
   72:      t_values_trapping,
   73:      t_groups_from_list].
   74: 
   75: t_from_list_kill_process(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   76:     Killer = self(),
   77:     {Child, ChildRef} =
   78:         spawn_monitor(
   79:           fun() ->
   80:                   MapSize = 10000,
   81:                   List = [{X, X} || X <- lists:seq(1, MapSize)],
   82:                   (fun Loop(Round) ->
   83:                           io:format("Sarting Round ~p~n", [Round]),
   84:                           case Round =:= 0 of
   85:                               true ->
   86:                                   Killer ! starting;
   87:                               false ->
   88:                                   ok
   89:                           end,
   90:                           Map = maps:from_list(List),
   91:                           io:format("Child survived round ~p ~p~n", [Round, maps:size(Map)]),
   92:                           Loop(Round + 1)
   93:                   end)(0)
   94:           end),
   95:     receive
   96:         starting -> ok
   97:     end,
   98:     exit(Child, kill),
   99:     %wait for exit message
  100:     receive
  101:         {'DOWN', ChildRef, process, _, killed} -> ok
  102:     end,
  103:     ok.
  104: 
  105: t_from_keys_kill_process(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  106:     Killer = self(),
  107:     {Child, ChildRef} =
  108:         spawn_monitor(
  109:           fun() ->
  110:                   MapSize = 10000,
  111:                   List = lists:seq(1, MapSize),
  112:                   (fun Loop(Round) ->
  113:                           io:format("Sarting Round ~p~n", [Round]),
  114:                           case Round =:= 0 of
  115:                               true ->
  116:                                   Killer ! starting;
  117:                               false ->
  118:                                   ok
  119:                           end,
  120:                           Map = maps:from_keys(List, ok),
  121:                           io:format("Child survived round ~p ~p~n", [Round, maps:size(Map)]),
  122:                           Loop(Round + 1)
  123:                   end)(0)
  124:           end),
  125:     receive
  126:         starting -> ok
  127:     end,
  128:     exit(Child, kill),
  129:     %wait for exit message
  130:     receive
  131:         {'DOWN', ChildRef, process, _, killed} -> ok
  132:     end,
  133:     ok.
  134: 
  135: t_keys_kill_process(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  136:     Killer = self(),
  137:     {Child, ChildRef} =
  138:         spawn_monitor(
  139:           fun() ->
  140:                   MapSize = 500000,
  141:                   List = lists:seq(1, MapSize),
  142:                   Map = maps:from_keys(List, ok),
  143:                   (fun Loop(Round) ->
  144:                           io:format("Sarting Round ~p~n", [Round]),
  145:                           case Round =:= 0 of
  146:                               true ->
  147:                                   Killer ! starting;
  148:                               false ->
  149:                                   ok
  150:                           end,
  151:                           Keys = maps:keys(Map),
  152:                           io:format("Child survived round ~p ~p~n", [Round, hd(Keys)]),
  153:                           Loop(Round + 1)
  154:                   end)(0)
  155:           end),
  156:     receive
  157:         starting -> ok
  158:     end,
  159:     exit(Child, kill),
  160:     %wait for exit message
  161:     receive
  162:         {'DOWN', ChildRef, process, _, killed} -> ok
  163:     end,
  164:     ok.
  165: 
  166: t_values_kill_process(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  167:     Killer = self(),
  168:     {Child, ChildRef} =
  169:         spawn_monitor(
  170:           fun() ->
  171:                   MapSize = 500000,
  172:                   List = [{V, V} || V <- lists:seq(1, MapSize)],
  173:                   Map = maps:from_list(List),
  174:                   (fun Loop(Round) ->
  175:                           io:format("Sarting Round ~p~n", [Round]),
  176:                           case Round =:= 0 of
  177:                               true ->
  178:                                   Killer ! starting;
  179:                               false ->
  180:                                   ok
  181:                           end,
  182:                           Values = maps:values(Map),
  183:                           io:format("Child survived round ~p ~p~n", [Round, hd(Values)]),
  184:                           Loop(Round + 1)
  185:                   end)(0)
  186:           end),
  187:     receive
  188:         starting -> ok
  189:     end,
  190:     exit(Child, kill),
  191:     %wait for exit message
  192:     receive
  193:         {'DOWN', ChildRef, process, _, killed} -> ok
  194:     end,
  195:     ok.
  196: 
  197: %% Check that maps:from_list/1 is trapping
  198: t_from_list_check_trapping(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  199:     FunToExecute =
  200:         fun() ->
  201:                 ListTmp = [{X,X} || X <- [X || {_,X} <- lists:sort([ {rand:uniform(), N} || N <- lists:seq(1,100000)])]],
  202:                 List = [{-1,-1} | ListTmp],
  203:                 M = maps:from_list(List),
  204:                 %% To avoid that compiler optimizes away the call above
  205:                 maps:get(-1, M)
  206:         end,
  207:     NoYields = count_nr_of_yields(FunToExecute, {maps, from_list, 1}),
  208:     io:format("No of yields: ~p~n", [NoYields]),
  209:     true = NoYields > 2.
  210: 
  211: %% Check that maps:from_keys/2 is trapping
  212: t_from_keys_check_trapping(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  213:     FunToExecute =
  214:         fun() ->
  215:                 ListTmp = [X || X <- [X || {_,X} <- lists:sort([ {rand:uniform(), N} || N <- lists:seq(1,1000000)])]],
  216:                 List = [-1 | ListTmp],
  217:                 M = maps:from_keys(List, ok),
  218:                 %% To avoid that compiler optimizes away the call above
  219:                 _ = maps:get(-1, M),
  220:                 ok
  221:         end,
  222:     NoYields = count_nr_of_yields(FunToExecute, {maps, from_keys, 2}),
  223:     io:format("No of yields: ~p~n", [NoYields]),
  224:     true = NoYields > 2.
  225: 
  226: %% Check that maps:keys/1 is trapping
  227: t_keys_trapping(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  228:     FunToExecute =
  229:         fun() ->
  230:                 ListTmp = [X || X <- [X || {_,X} <- lists:sort([ {rand:uniform(), N} || N <- lists:seq(1,1000000)])]],
  231:                 List = [-1 | ListTmp],
  232:                 M = maps:from_keys(List, ok),
  233:                 Keys = maps:keys(M),
  234:                 %% To avoid that compiler optimizes away the call above
  235:                 [-1 | _] = lists:sort(Keys),
  236:                 ok
  237:         end,
  238:     NoYields = count_nr_of_yields(FunToExecute, {maps, keys, 1}),
  239:     io:format("No of yields: ~p~n", [NoYields]),
  240:     true = NoYields > 2.
  241: 
  242: %% Check that maps:values/1 is trapping
  243: t_values_trapping(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  244:     FunToExecute =
  245:         fun() ->
  246:                 ListTmp = [{X,X} || X <- [X || {_,X} <- lists:sort([ {rand:uniform(), N} || N <- lists:seq(1,1000000)])]],
  247:                 List = [{-1,-1} | ListTmp],
  248:                 M = maps:from_list(List),
  249:                 Values = maps:values(M),
  250:                 %% To avoid that compiler optimizes away the call above
  251:                 [-1 | _] = lists:sort(Values),
  252:                 ok
  253:         end,
  254:     NoYields = count_nr_of_yields(FunToExecute, {maps, values, 1}),
  255:     io:format("No of yields: ~p~n", [NoYields]),
  256:     true = NoYields > 2.
  257: 
  258: count_nr_of_yields(FunToExecute, FunctionId) ->
  259:     Tracer = self(),
  260:     {Pid, Mon} =
  261:         spawn_monitor(
  262:           fun () ->
  263:                   erlang:trace(self(),true,[running,{tracer,Tracer}]),
  264:                   FunToExecute()
  265:           end),
  266:     receive
  267: 	{'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
  268: 	    normal = Reason
  269:     end,
  270:     TD = erlang:trace_delivered(Pid),
  271:     receive
  272: 	{trace_delivered, Pid, TD} ->
  273:             trace_get_number_of_yields(Pid, FunctionId, 0)
  274:     end.
  275: 
  276: trace_get_number_of_yields(P, TrapFunc, N) ->
  277:     receive
  278: 	{trace, P, out, TrapFunc} ->
  279: 	    receive
  280: 		{trace, P, in, TrapFunc} ->
  281:                     trace_get_number_of_yields(P, TrapFunc, N+1)
  282: 	    after 0 ->
  283: 		    exit(trap_sched_mismatch)
  284: 	    end;
  285: 	{trace, P, out, Func} ->
  286: 	    receive
  287: 		{trace, P, in, Func} ->
  288: 		    trace_get_number_of_yields(P, TrapFunc, N)
  289: 	    after 0 ->
  290: 		    exit(other_sched_mismatch)
  291: 	    end
  292:     after 0 ->
  293: 	    N
  294:     end.
  295: 
  296: t_from_keys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  297:     Map0 = maps:from_keys(["a", 2, {three}], value),
  298:     3 = map_size(Map0),
  299:     #{"a":=value,2:=value,{three}:=value} = Map0,
  300: 
  301:     Map1 = maps:from_keys([1, 2, 2], {complex,value}),
  302:     2 = map_size(Map1),
  303:     #{1:={complex,value},2:={complex,value}} = Map1,
  304: 
  305:     Map2 = maps:from_keys([], value),
  306:     0 = map_size(Map2),
  307: 
  308:     ?badarg(from_keys,[[a|b],value]) = (catch maps:from_keys([a|b],value)),
  309:     ?badarg(from_keys,[not_list,value]) = (catch maps:from_keys(not_list,value)),
  310:     ok.
  311: 
  312: t_update_with_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  313:     V1 = value1,
  314:     V2 = <<"value2">>,
  315:     V3 = "value3",
  316:     Map = #{ key1 => V1, key2 => V2, "key3" => V3 },
  317:     Fun = fun(V) -> [V,V,{V,V}] end,
  318: 
  319:     #{ key1 := [V1,V1,{V1,V1}] } = maps:update_with(key1,Fun,Map),
  320:     #{ key2 := [V2,V2,{V2,V2}] } = maps:update_with(key2,Fun,Map),
  321:     #{ "key3" := [V3,V3,{V3,V3}] } = maps:update_with("key3",Fun,Map),
  322: 
  323:     %% error case
  324:     ?badmap(b,update_with,[[a,b],a,b]) = (catch maps:update_with([a,b],id(a),b)),
  325:     ?badarg(update_with,[[a,b],a,#{}]) = (catch maps:update_with([a,b],id(a),#{})),
  326:     ?badkey([a,b],update_with,[[a,b],Fun,#{}]) = (catch maps:update_with([a,b],Fun,#{})),
  327:     ok.
  328: 
  329: t_update_with_4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  330:     V1 = value1,
  331:     V2 = <<"value2">>,
  332:     V3 = "value3",
  333:     Map = #{ key1 => V1, key2 => V2, "key3" => V3 },
  334:     Fun = fun(V) -> [V,V,{V,V}] end,
  335:     Init = 3,
  336: 
  337:     #{ key1 := [V1,V1,{V1,V1}] } = maps:update_with(key1,Fun,Init,Map),
  338:     #{ key2 := [V2,V2,{V2,V2}] } = maps:update_with(key2,Fun,Init,Map),
  339:     #{ "key3" := [V3,V3,{V3,V3}] } = maps:update_with("key3",Fun,Init,Map),
  340: 
  341:     #{ key3 := Init } = maps:update_with(key3,Fun,Init,Map),
  342: 
  343:     %% error case
  344:     ?badmap(b,update_with,[[a,b],a,b]) = (catch maps:update_with([a,b],id(a),b)),
  345:     ?badarg(update_with,[[a,b],a,#{}]) = (catch maps:update_with([a,b],id(a),#{})),
  346:     ok.
  347: 
  348: 
  349: t_get_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  350:     Map = #{ key1 => value1, key2 => value2 },
  351:     DefaultValue = "Default value",
  352:     value1 = maps:get(key1, Map, DefaultValue),
  353:     value2 = maps:get(key2, Map, DefaultValue),
  354:     DefaultValue = maps:get(key3, Map, DefaultValue),
  355: 
  356:     %% error case
  357:     ?badmap(a,get,[[a,b],a,def]) = (catch maps:get([a,b],id(a),def)),
  358:     ok.
  359: 
  360: t_without_2(_Config) ->
  361:     Ki = [11,22,33,44,55,66,77,88,99],
  362:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)]),
  363:     M1 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}}||I<-lists:seq(1,100) -- Ki]),
  364:     M1 = maps:without([{k,I}||I <- Ki],M0),
  365: 
  366:     %% error case
  367:     ?badmap(a,without,[[a,b],a]) = (catch maps:without([a,b],id(a))),
  368:     ?badmap(a,without,[{a,b},a]) = (catch maps:without({a,b},id(a))),
  369:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97},without,[[],{0,<<>>,97}]) = (catch maps:without([], {0,<<>>,97})),
  370:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97},without,[[false, -20, -8],{0,<<>>,97}]) = (catch maps:without([false, -20, -8], {0, <<>>, 97})),
  371:     ?badarg(without,[a,#{}]) = (catch maps:without(a,#{})),
  372:     ok.
  373: 
  374: t_with_2(_Config) ->
  375:     Ki = [11,22,33,44,55,66,77,88,99],
  376:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)]),
  377:     M1 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}}||I<-Ki]),
  378:     M1 = maps:with([{k,I}||I <- Ki],M0),
  379: 
  380:     %% error case
  381:     ?badmap(a,with,[[a,b],a]) = (catch maps:with([a,b],id(a))),
  382:     ?badmap(a,with,[{a,b},a]) = (catch maps:with({a,b},id(a))),
  383:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97},with,[[],{0,<<>>,97}]) = (catch maps:with([], {0,<<>>,97})),
  384:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97},with,[[false, -20, -8],{0,<<>>,97}]) = (catch maps:with([false, -20, -8], {0, <<>>, 97})),
  385:     ?badarg(with,[a,#{}]) = (catch maps:with(a,#{})),
  386:     ok.
  387: 
  388: t_filter_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  389:     M = #{a => 2, b => 3, c=> 4, "a" => 1, "b" => 2, "c" => 4},
  390:     Pred1 = fun(K,V) -> is_atom(K) andalso (V rem 2) =:= 0 end,
  391:     Pred2 = fun(K,V) -> is_list(K) andalso (V rem 2) =:= 0 end,
  392:     #{a := 2,c := 4} = maps:filter(Pred1,M),
  393:     #{"b" := 2,"c" := 4} = maps:filter(Pred2,M),
  394:     #{a := 2,c := 4} = maps:filter(Pred1,maps:iterator(M)),
  395:     #{"b" := 2,"c" := 4} = maps:filter(Pred2,maps:iterator(M)),
  396:     %% error case
  397:     ?badmap(a,filter,[_,a]) = (catch maps:filter(fun(_,_) -> ok end,id(a))),
  398:     ?badarg(filter,[<<>>,#{}]) = (catch maps:filter(id(<<>>),#{})),
  399:     ok.
  400: 
  401: t_filtermap_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  402:     M0 = maps:from_list([{I, I} || I <- lists:seq(1, 30)]),
  403:     Pred = fun(K,_) when K=<10 -> true; (K,_) when K=<20 -> false; (_,V) -> {true, V * V} end,
  404:     M1 = maps:filtermap(Pred, M0),
  405:     M2 = maps:filtermap(Pred, maps:iterator(M0)),
  406:     #{1 := 1, 10 := 10, 21 := 21 * 21, 30 := 30 * 30} = M1,
  407:     false = maps:is_key(11, M1),
  408:     false = maps:is_key(20, M1),
  409:     true = M1 =:= M2,
  410:     %% error case
  411:     ?badmap(a,filtermap,[_,a]) = (catch maps:filtermap(fun(_,_) -> ok end,id(a))),
  412:     ?badarg(filtermap,[<<>>,#{}]) = (catch maps:filtermap(id(<<>>),#{})),
  413:     ok.
  414: 
  415: t_fold_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  416:     Vs = lists:seq(1,200),
  417:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I}||I<-Vs]),
  418:     #{ {k,1} := 1, {k,200} := 200} = M0,
  419:     Tot0 = lists:sum(Vs),
  420:     Tot1 = maps:fold(fun({k,_},V,A) -> A + V end, 0, M0),
  421:     true = Tot0 =:= Tot1,
  422:     Tot2 = maps:fold(fun({k,_},V,A) -> A + V end, 0, maps:iterator(M0)),
  423:     true = Tot0 =:= Tot2,
  424: 
  425:     %% error case
  426:     ?badmap(a,fold,[_,0,a]) = (catch maps:fold(fun(_,_,_) -> ok end,0,id(a))),
  427:     ?badarg(fold,[<<>>,0,#{}]) = (catch maps:fold(id(<<>>),0,#{})),
  428:     ok.
  429: 
  430: t_map_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  431:     Vs = lists:seq(1,200),
  432:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I}||I<-Vs]),
  433:     #{ {k,1} := 1, {k,200} := 200} = M0,
  434:     M1 = maps:map(fun({k,_},V) -> V + 42 end, M0),
  435:     #{ {k,1} := 43, {k,200} := 242} = M1,
  436:     M2 = maps:map(fun({k,_},V) -> V + 42 end, maps:iterator(M0)),
  437:     #{ {k,1} := 43, {k,200} := 242} = M2,
  438: 
  439:     %% error case
  440:     ?badmap(a,map,[_,a]) = (catch maps:map(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id(a))),
  441:     ?badarg(map,[<<>>,#{}]) = (catch maps:map(id(<<>>),#{})),
  442:     ok.
  443: 
  444: t_foreach_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  445:     %% error case
  446:     ?badmap(a,foreach,[_,a]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id(a))),
  447:     ?badmap([],foreach,[_,[]]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id([]))),
  448:     ?badmap({},foreach,[_,{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id({}))),
  449:     ?badmap(42,foreach,[_,42]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id(42))),
  450:     ?badmap(<<>>,foreach,[_,<<>>]) = (catch maps:foreach(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id(<<>>))),
  451: 
  452:     ?badarg(foreach,[<<>>,#{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id(<<>>),#{})),
  453:     F0 = fun() -> ok end,
  454:     F3 = fun(_, _, _) -> ok end,
  455:     ?badarg(foreach,[F0, #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id(F0), #{})),
  456:     ?badarg(foreach,[F3, #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id(F3), #{})),
  457:     ?badarg(foreach,[a, #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id(a), #{})),
  458:     ?badarg(foreach,[[], #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id([]), #{})),
  459:     ?badarg(foreach,[{}, #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id({}), #{})),
  460:     ?badarg(foreach,[42, #{}]) = (catch maps:foreach(id(42), #{})),
  461:     ok.
  462: 
  463: t_iterator_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  464: 
  465:     %% Small map test
  466:     M0 = #{ a => 1, b => 2 },
  467:     I0 = maps:iterator(M0),
  468:     {K1,V1,I1} = maps:next(I0),
  469:     {K2,V2,I2} = maps:next(I1),
  470:     none = maps:next(I2),
  471: 
  472:     KVList = lists:sort([{K1,V1},{K2,V2}]),
  473:     KVList = lists:sort(maps:to_list(M0)),
  474: 
  475:     %% Large map test
  476: 
  477:     Vs2 = lists:seq(1,200),
  478:     M2 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I}||I<-Vs2]),
  479:     KVList2 = lists:sort(iter_kv(maps:iterator(M2))),
  480:     KVList2 = lists:sort(maps:to_list(M2)),
  481: 
  482:     %% Larger map test
  483: 
  484:     Vs3 = lists:seq(1,10000),
  485:     M3 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I}||I<-Vs3]),
  486:     KVList3 = lists:sort(iter_kv(maps:iterator(M3))),
  487:     KVList3 = lists:sort(maps:to_list(M3)),
  488:     ok.
  489: 
  490: iter_kv(I) ->
  491:     case maps:next(I) of
  492:         none ->
  493:             [];
  494:         {K,V,NI} ->
  495:             [{K,V} | iter_kv(NI)]
  496:     end.
  497: 
  498: t_put_opt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  499:     Value = id(#{complex => map}),
  500:     Small = id(#{a => Value}),
  501:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:put(a, Value, Small), Small),
  502: 
  503:     LargeBase = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,200)]),
  504:     Large = LargeBase#{a => Value},
  505:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:put(a, Value, Large), Large),
  506:     ok.
  507: 
  508: t_merge_opt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  509:     Small = id(#{a => 1}),
  510:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(#{}, Small), Small),
  511:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(Small, #{}), Small),
  512:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(Small, Small), Small),
  513: 
  514:     Large = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,200)]),
  515:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(#{}, Large), Large),
  516:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(Large, #{}), Large),
  517:     true = erts_debug:same(maps:merge(Large, Large), Large),
  518: 
  519:     List = id([a|b]),
  520:     ?badmap([a|b],merge,[[a|b],[a|b]]) = (catch maps:merge(List, List)),
  521: 
  522:     ok.
  523: 
  524: random_map(SizeConstant, InitSeed) ->
  525:     {Ret, _} =
  526:         lists:foldl(
  527:           fun(_, {Map, Seed}) ->
  528:                   rand:uniform_s(Seed),
  529:                   {K, Seed2} = rand:uniform_s(SizeConstant, Seed),
  530:                   {V, Seed3} = rand:uniform_s(SizeConstant*100, Seed2),
  531:                   {Map#{K => V}, Seed3}
  532:           end,
  533:           {#{}, rand:seed_s(exsss, SizeConstant + InitSeed)},
  534:           lists:seq(1, SizeConstant)),
  535:     Ret.
  536: 
  537: check_map_combiners_same_small(MapCombiner1, MapCombiner2, Seed) ->
  538:     lists:foreach(
  539:       fun(SizeConstant) ->
  540:               lists:foreach(
  541:                 fun(SeedMult) ->
  542:                    RandMap1 = random_map(SizeConstant,
  543:                                          SizeConstant + 100000*SeedMult + Seed),
  544:                    RandMap2 = random_map(SizeConstant,
  545:                                          SizeConstant + 200000*SeedMult + Seed),
  546:                    Comb1Res = MapCombiner1(RandMap1, RandMap2),
  547:                    Comb2Res = MapCombiner2(RandMap1, RandMap2),
  548:                    Comb1Res = Comb2Res
  549:                 end,
  550:                 lists:seq(1,100))
  551: 
  552:       end,
  553:       lists:seq(1,10)).
  554: 
  555: 
  556: check_map_combiners_same_large(MapCombiner1, MapCombiner2, Seed) ->
  557:     lists:foreach(
  558:       fun(SizeConstant) ->
  559:               RandMap1 = random_map(SizeConstant, SizeConstant + Seed),
  560:               RandMap2 = random_map(SizeConstant, SizeConstant + Seed),
  561:               Comb1Res = MapCombiner1(RandMap1, RandMap2),
  562:               Comb2Res = MapCombiner2(RandMap1, RandMap2),
  563:               Comb1Res = Comb2Res
  564:       end,
  565:       [1000, 10000]),
  566:     ok.
  567: 
  568: t_merge_with(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  569:     Small = #{1 => 1, 2 => 3},
  570:     Large = #{1 => 3, 2 => 2, 10=>10},
  571:     #{1 := {1,3}, 2 := {3,2}, 10 := 10} =
  572:         maps:merge_with(fun(1, 1, 3) -> {1, 3};
  573:                            (2, 3, 2) -> {3, 2}
  574:                         end,
  575:                         Small,
  576:                         Large),
  577: 
  578:     %% Swapping input maps should reverse tuples
  579: 
  580:     #{1 := {3,1}, 2 := {2,3}, 10 := 10} =
  581:         maps:merge_with(fun(1, V1, V2) -> {V1, V2};
  582:                            (2, V1, V2) -> {V1, V2}
  583:                         end,
  584:                         Large,
  585:                         Small),
  586: 
  587:     %% Swapping parameters in the output of the fun should also reverse
  588:     %% tuples
  589: 
  590:     #{1 := {3,1}, 2 := {2,3}, 10 := 10} =
  591:         maps:merge_with(fun(1, V1, V2) -> {V2, V1};
  592:                            (2, V1, V2) -> {V2, V1}
  593:                         end,
  594:                         Small,
  595:                         Large),
  596: 
  597:     %% Should give the same result as maps:merge/2 with the right combiner
  598: 
  599:     DefaultCombiner = fun(_, _, V2) -> V2 end,
  600:     Merge2FromMerge3 = fun (M1, M2) -> maps:merge_with(DefaultCombiner, M1, M2) end,
  601:     check_map_combiners_same_small(fun maps:merge/2, Merge2FromMerge3, 1),
  602:     check_map_combiners_same_large(fun maps:merge/2, Merge2FromMerge3, 2),
  603: 
  604:     %% Should conceptually compute the same thing as
  605:     %% lists:ukey_merge/2 with the right combiner
  606: 
  607:     MergeFromUKeyMerge =
  608:         fun(M1, M2) ->
  609:                 L1 = lists:sort(maps:to_list(M1)),
  610:                 L2 = lists:sort(maps:to_list(M2)),
  611:                 %% ukeymerge takes from the first when collision
  612:                 ResList = lists:ukeymerge(1, L2, L1),
  613:                 maps:from_list(ResList)
  614:         end,
  615:     check_map_combiners_same_small(MergeFromUKeyMerge, Merge2FromMerge3, 3),
  616:     check_map_combiners_same_large(MergeFromUKeyMerge, Merge2FromMerge3, 4),
  617: 
  618:     %% Empty maps
  619: 
  620:     Large = maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  621:                             Large,
  622:                             #{}),
  623:     Large = maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  624:                             #{},
  625:                             Large),
  626:     #{} = maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  627:                           #{},
  628:                           #{}),
  629: 
  630:     %% Errors
  631: 
  632:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  633:         (catch maps:merge_with(not_a_fun,#{},#{})),
  634:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  635:         (catch maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end, a, #{})),
  636:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, b}, _}} =
  637:         (catch maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(ok) end, #{}, b)),
  638:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  639:         (catch maps:merge_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(ok) end, a, b)),
  640:     ok.
  641: 
  642: t_intersect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  643:     Small = #{1 => 1, 2 => 3},
  644:     Large = #{1 => 3, 2 => 2, 10=>10},
  645:     #{1 := 3,2 := 2} = maps:intersect(Small, Large),
  646: 
  647:     %% Swapping input maps can make a difference
  648: 
  649:     #{1 := 1, 2 := 3} = maps:intersect(Large, Small),
  650: 
  651:     %% Should conceptually compute the same thing as
  652:     %% gb_sets:intersect/2 with the right combiner
  653: 
  654:     IntersectFromGBSets =
  655:         fun(M1, M2) ->
  656:                 Map1Keys = maps:keys(M1),
  657:                 Map2Keys = maps:keys(M2),
  658:                 GBSet1 = gb_sets:from_list(Map1Keys),
  659:                 GBSet2 = gb_sets:from_list(Map2Keys),
  660:                 GBSetIntersection = gb_sets:intersection(GBSet1, GBSet2),
  661:                 IntersectList = gb_sets:to_list(GBSetIntersection),
  662:                 lists:foldl(
  663:                   fun(Key, SoFar) ->
  664:                           SoFar#{Key => maps:get(Key, M2)}
  665:                   end,
  666:                   #{},
  667:                   IntersectList)
  668:         end,
  669:     check_map_combiners_same_small(fun maps:intersect/2,
  670:                                    IntersectFromGBSets,
  671:                                    11),
  672:     check_map_combiners_same_large(fun maps:intersect/2,
  673:                                    IntersectFromGBSets,
  674:                                    13),
  675: 
  676:     %% Empty maps
  677: 
  678:     #{} = maps:intersect(Large, #{}),
  679:     #{} = maps:intersect(#{}, Large),
  680:     #{} = maps:intersect(#{}, #{}),
  681: 
  682:     %% Errors
  683: 
  684:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  685:         (catch maps:intersect(a, #{})),
  686:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, b}, _}} =
  687:         (catch maps:intersect(#{}, b)),
  688:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  689:         (catch maps:intersect(a, b)),
  690:     ok.
  691: 
  692: t_intersect_with(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  693:     Small = #{1 => 1, 2 => 3},
  694:     Large = #{1 => 3, 2 => 2, 10=>10},
  695:     #{1 := {1,3}, 2 := {3,2}} =
  696:         maps:intersect_with(fun(1, 1, 3) -> {1, 3};
  697:                                (2, 3, 2) -> {3, 2}
  698:                             end,
  699:                             Small,
  700:                             Large),
  701: 
  702:     %% Swapping input maps should reverse tuples
  703: 
  704:     #{1 := {3,1}, 2 := {2,3}} =
  705:         maps:intersect_with(fun(1, V1, V2) -> {V1, V2};
  706:                                (2, V1, V2) -> {V1, V2}
  707:                             end,
  708:                             Large,
  709:                             Small),
  710: 
  711:     %% Swapping parameters in the output of the fun should also reverse
  712:     %% tuples
  713: 
  714:     #{1 := {3,1}, 2 := {2,3}} =
  715:         maps:intersect_with(fun(1, V1, V2) -> {V2, V1};
  716:                                (2, V1, V2) -> {V2, V1}
  717:                             end,
  718:                             Small,
  719:                             Large),
  720: 
  721:     %% Should give the same result as intersect/2 with the right combiner
  722: 
  723:     DefaultCombiner = fun(_, _, V2) -> V2 end,
  724:     Intersect2FromIntersect3 =
  725:         fun (M1, M2) -> maps:intersect_with(DefaultCombiner, M1, M2) end,
  726:     check_map_combiners_same_small(fun maps:intersect/2,
  727:                                    Intersect2FromIntersect3,
  728:                                    7),
  729:     check_map_combiners_same_large(fun maps:intersect/2,
  730:                                    Intersect2FromIntersect3,
  731:                                    8),
  732: 
  733:     %% Empty maps
  734: 
  735:     #{} = maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  736:                               Large,
  737:                               #{}),
  738:     #{} = maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  739:                               #{},
  740:                               Large),
  741:     #{} = maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end,
  742:                               #{},
  743:                               #{}),
  744: 
  745:     %% Errors
  746: 
  747:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
  748:         (catch maps:intersect_with(not_a_fun,#{},#{})),
  749:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  750:         (catch maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(should_not_happen) end, a, #{})),
  751:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, b}, _}} =
  752:         (catch maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(ok) end, #{}, b)),
  753:     {'EXIT', {{badmap, a}, _}} =
  754:         (catch maps:intersect_with(fun(_K, _V1, _V2) -> error(ok) end, a, b)),
  755:     ok.
  756: 
  757: t_size_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  758:       0 = maps:size(#{}),
  759:      10 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,10)])),
  760:      20 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,20)])),
  761:      30 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,30)])),
  762:      40 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,40)])),
  763:      50 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,50)])),
  764:      60 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,60)])),
  765:     600 = maps:size(maps:from_list([{{"k",I},I}||I<-lists:seq(1,600)])),
  766: 
  767:     %% error case
  768:     %%
  769:     %% Note that the stack trace is ignored because the compiler may have
  770:     %% rewritten maps:size/2 to map_size.
  771:     {'EXIT', {{badmap,a}, _}} = (catch maps:size(id(a))),
  772:     {'EXIT', {{badmap,<<>>}, _}} = (catch maps:size(id(<<>>))),
  773:     ok.
  774: 
  775: t_groups_from_list(_Config) ->
  776:     #{} = maps:groups_from_list(fun erlang:length/1, []),
  777:     #{3 := ["tna","tac"], 5 := ["ognid"], 7 := ["olaffub"]} =
  778:         maps:groups_from_list(
  779:           fun erlang:length/1,
  780:           fun lists:reverse/1,
  781:           ["ant", "buffalo", "cat", "dingo"]
  782:          ),
  783:     #{0 := [2], 1 := [1, 3]} = maps:groups_from_list(fun(X) -> X rem 2 end, [1, 2, 3]).
  784: 
  785: error_info(_Config) ->
  786:     BadIterator = [-1|#{}],
  787:     GoodIterator = maps:iterator(#{}),
  788: 
  789:     L = [{filter, [fun(_, _) -> true end, abc]},
  790:          {filter, [fun(_, _) -> true end, BadIterator]},
  791:          {filter, [bad_fun, BadIterator],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
  792:          {filter, [bad_fun, GoodIterator]},
  793: 
  794:          {filtermap, [fun(_, _) -> true end, abc]},
  795:          {filtermap, [fun(_, _) -> true end, BadIterator]},
  796:          {filtermap, [fun(_) -> true end, GoodIterator]},
  797:          {filtermap, [fun(_) -> ok end, #{}]},
  798: 
  799:          {find, [key, no_map]},
  800: 
  801:          {fold, [fun(_, _, _) -> true end, init, abc]},
  802:          {fold, [fun(_, _, _) -> true end, init, BadIterator]},
  803:          {fold, [fun(_) -> true end, init, GoodIterator]},
  804:          {fold, [fun(_) -> ok end, init, #{}]},
  805: 
  806:          {foreach, [fun(_, _) -> ok end, no_map]},
  807:          {foreach, [fun(_, _) -> ok end, BadIterator]},
  808:          {foreach, [fun(_) -> ok end, GoodIterator]},
  809:          {foreach, [fun(_) -> ok end, #{}]},
  810: 
  811:          {from_keys, [#{a => b}, whatever]},
  812:          {from_keys, [[a|b], whatever]},
  813: 
  814:          {from_list, [#{a => b}]},
  815:          {from_list, [[a|b]]},
  816: 
  817:          {get, [key, #{}]},
  818:          {get, [key, {no,map}]},
  819:          {get, [key, {no,map}, default]},
  820: 
  821:          {groups_from_list, [not_a_fun, []]},
  822:          {groups_from_list, [fun hd/1, not_a_list]},
  823: 
  824:          {groups_from_list, [not_a_fun, fun(_) -> ok end, []]},
  825:          {groups_from_list, [fun(_) -> ok end, not_a_fun, []]},
  826:          {groups_from_list, [fun(_) -> ok end, fun(_) -> ok end, not_a_list]},
  827: 
  828:          {intersect, [#{a => b}, y]},
  829:          {intersect, [x, #{a => b}]},
  830:          {intersect, [x, y],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
  831: 
  832:          {intersect_with, [fun(_, _, _) -> ok end, #{a => b}, y]},
  833:          {intersect_with, [fun(_, _, _) -> ok end, x, #{a => b}]},
  834:          {intersect_with, [fun(_, _, _) -> ok end, x, y],[{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
  835:          {intersect_with, [fun(_, _) -> ok end, #{}, #{}]},
  836: 
  837:          {is_key,[key, no_map]},
  838: 
  839:          {iterator,[{no,map}]},
  840: 
  841:          {keys, [{no,map}]},
  842: 
  843:          {map, [fun(_, _) -> true end, abc]},
  844:          {map, [fun(_, _) -> true end, BadIterator]},
  845:          {map, [fun(_) -> true end, GoodIterator]},
  846:          {map, [fun(_) -> ok end, #{}]},
  847: 
  848:          {merge,[#{a => b}, {a,b}]},
  849:          {merge,[{x,y}, #{a => b}]},
  850:          {merge,[{x,y}, {a,b}],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
  851: 
  852:          {merge_with, [fun(_, _) -> ok end, #{}, #{}]},
  853:          {merge_with, [a, b, c],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
  854: 
  855:          {next,[no_iterator]},
  856: 
  857:          {put, [key, value, {no,map}]},
  858: 
  859:          {remove,[key, {no,map}]},
  860: 
  861:          {size, [no_map]},
  862: 
  863:          {take, [key, no_map]},
  864: 
  865:          {to_list,[xyz]},
  866: 
  867:          {update,[key, value, no_map]},
  868: 
  869:          {update_with, [key, fun(_) -> ok end, {no,map}]},
  870:          {update_with, [key, fun() -> ok end, #{}]},
  871: 
  872:          {update_with, [key, fun(_) -> ok end, init, {no,map}]},
  873:          {update_with, [key, fun() -> ok end, init, #{}]},
  874: 
  875:          {values,[no_map]},
  876: 
  877:          {with, [not_list, #{}]},
  878:          {with, [[1,2,3], {no,map}]},
  879: 
  880:          {without, [not_list, #{}]},
  881:          {without, [[1,2,3], {no,map}]}
  882:         ],
  883:     error_info_lib:test_error_info(maps, L).
  884: 
  885: id(I) -> I.
